title: 12 Best Sites Like Swagbucks To Make Money
description: Looking for ways to make extra cash online? Websites like Swagbucks can give you many chances to make money from home. You can answer surveys, watch videos, play game apps to win real money, and more to earn extra money. If you’re looking to make more money, trying out different reward sites can be an... The post 12 Best Sites Like Swagbucks To Make Money appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Want to make money from home? Here are the 12 best websites like Swagbucks to make money online in your free time.
text: Looking for ways to make extra cash online? Websites like Swagbucks can give you many chances to make money from home. You can answer surveys, watch videos, play game apps to win real money, and more to earn extra money. If you’re looking to make more money, trying out different reward sites can be an… Looking for ways to make extra cash online? Websites like Swagbucks can give you many chances to make money from home. You can answer surveys, watch videos, play game apps to win real money, and more to earn extra money. If you’re looking to make more money, trying out different reward sites can be an easy move. Each one has its own set of tasks and ways to earn. Some might pay better for certain activities, while others could have easier goals to reach. I have earned over 100 free gift cards and PayPal money by using many of the sites below, so I know they are real! What Is Swagbucks? Swagbucks is a free website that pays you to do easy online tasks. You can earn points called SB for things like: Taking surveys Watching videos Playing games Shopping online Searching the web Scanning receipts It’s simple to use and you can do it anywhere with internet access. When you earn enough SB points, you can trade them for gift cards or PayPal cash. Swagbucks started in 2008 (you can find my full Swagbucks review here). Since then, they’ve given out over $606 million to members. Every day, about 7,000 people get free gift cards. You won’t get rich using Swagbucks. But it’s an easy way to earn some extra spending money or save up for small treats. Many people use it during free time, like when watching TV. I have been using this site since around 2011 and I have earned over 100 free gift cards. I like to use my points for free Amazon gift cards! If you join Swagbucks through my referral link, you will receive a $10 bonus. I have redeemed 109 gift cards so far from Swagbucks, as you can see in the image above. Best Websites Like Swagbucks Here’s a quick list of the best sites like Swagbucks: Freecash KashKick InboxDollars Fetch Rewards Survey Junkie Pinecone Research PrizeRebel MyPoints Branded Surveys American Consumer Opinion Ipsos iSay Rakuten Below are the best websites like Swagbucks to make money. Proof that I made money playing games on Freecash. The $0.05 amounts were rewards for playing 2 minutes each day. The larger amounts like $40, $70, and $150 were for reaching certain levels. 1. Freecash Freecash is a website that lets you earn money by doing fun activities online. You can make extra cash by playing games, trying new apps, and answering surveys. It’s really easy to use and you can start earning right away. When you sign up for Freecash, you’ll see lots of different ways to make money. You can pick the ones that sound most interesting to you. For example, you might get paid to play a new game on your phone or share your thoughts in a survey. Some people are able to earn a decent amount on Freecash as well. They have a leaderboard where you can see exactly how much others have earned. According to this leaderboard, one person had made $5,698.71 in the last 25 days! Many others have made over $1,000 in the same time frame as well. I have personally made a little over $300 by playing games on my phone on Freecash in only one week. You can read about it here – How I Made $302.80 Playing Games on My Phone (In One Week). Click here to sign up for Freecash. Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit? 2. KashKick KashKick is a rewards site where you can earn money by doing fun activities online. You can take surveys, play games, and try out new apps to make extra cash. One fun thing about KashKick is that you can play popular games like Monopoly GO, Yahtzee, and Bingo Blitz. You can earn up to $100 or more for reaching certain levels in these games. KashKick pays you through PayPal once you reach $10 in earnings. Please click here to sign up for KashKick for free. Recommended reading: KashKick Review 3. InboxDollars InboxDollars is a great option if you like Swagbucks as they are very similar. It’s easy to use and has many ways to earn money online. You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and shop to earn cash. InboxDollars also lets you earn by reading emails and searching the web. Most surveys on InboxDollars pay between $0.50 and $5. When you sign up, you get a $5 bonus and this site pays in real cash instead of points, which is nice. The site works on computers and phones. This means you can earn money anywhere, anytime. InboxDollars is owned by the same company as Swagbucks, so it’s trustworthy and reliable. Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus. 4. Fetch Rewards Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you points for scanning your receipts. You can use it at any store or restaurant. I scan every single one of my grocery receipts and earn free points, for example. Here’s how it works: You shop like normal, then take a picture of your receipt with your phone. The app gives you points for each receipt you scan. You can earn more points by buying certain items and the app shows you which products will get you extra points. Once you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get cards for places like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. Fetch Rewards is easy to use. You don’t need to clip coupons or do surveys. Just scan your receipts and watch your points grow. I love this app because it’s really easy to use. I’ve been using it for a while, and it makes earning rewards from your regular shopping simple. I just used my points to get a $50 Amazon gift card the other day! You can sign up for Fetch Rewards here.  Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review (Is This App Legit?) 5. Survey Junkie Survey Junkie is a popular site that pays you for sharing your opinions. It focuses on surveys, so it doesn’t have games or other ways to earn points – but it has a lot of available surveys for you to answer. You can sign up for free and start earning points right away. The surveys are about different topics, and you pick the ones you want to do. Each survey tells you how long it will take and how many points you’ll get, so this helps you choose the best ones for your time. When you have enough points, you can trade them for money. You can get paid through PayPal or with gift cards. You can sign up for Survey Junkie here. 6. Pinecone Research Pinecone Research is a popular survey site that lets you make money sharing your opinions. It’s similar to Swagbucks but focuses mainly on surveys. You can earn points for each survey you complete and these points can be traded for cash or prizes. Pinecone Research is known for paying well, as well as giving free items occasionally to test. Most surveys pay around $3 each. To join, you need an invite so this makes it more exclusive than some other survey sites. Like Swagbucks, Pinecone Research is free to join. You don’t need to pay anything to start earning money from surveys. I have been using Pinecone Research for years and personally earned money from this company. In the past, I have been able to test a few different household products through Pinecone Research, such as toilet paper. It is very popular! You can sign up for Pinecone Research here. Recommended reading: Pinecone Research Review: What You Should Know 7. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is another site where you can earn money online. It’s like Swagbucks in many ways. You can make extra cash by taking surveys and doing small tasks. The site is easy to use. You can start earning points right away and your points can be turned into cash or gift cards. PrizeRebel has surveys as its main way to earn. You can also watch videos and complete offers. You can cash out your earnings once you reach $5. This is a low threshold, so you can get your rewards quickly. PrizeRebel pays through PayPal or gift cards. You can sign up for PrizeRebel here. 8. MyPoints MyPoints is a lot like Swagbucks. You can earn points for doing fun online activities such as taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games. One cool thing about MyPoints is that you get points for shopping online. Just click through their links to your favorite stores and earn points on your purchases. You can also earn by reading emails and printing coupons. It’s easy to rack up points quickly with all these options. When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards (popular gift card choices include Amazon, Walmart, and Starbucks) or PayPal cash. You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here. 9. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a popular website where you can make money by sharing your opinions. It’s free to join and available to people in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom. You can earn points by taking surveys on different topics. These surveys usually pay between $0.50 and $5 each, depending on how long they take. Most surveys take about 5 to 20 minutes to finish. When you sign up, you’ll get 100 free points as a welcome bonus. You can also earn points by inviting friends, answering daily polls, and winning leaderboard contests. Once you have 500 points (worth $5), you can cash out. You can choose to get paid through PayPal or pick from over 100 different gift card options. Branded Surveys is great for making some extra cash in your spare time. You won’t get rich, but it’s an easy way to earn money while watching TV or relaxing at home. All you need is an internet connection and a device like a phone or computer. You can sign up for Branded Surveys here. Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn 10. American Consumer Opinion American Consumer Opinion is a survey site where you can make money sharing your thoughts. It’s been around for a while and has a good reputation. You can take surveys about different topics like products, ads, and current events. Most surveys pay between $0.50 and $2.50, but some longer ones can pay up to $50. Signing up is free and easy because you just need to give some basic info about yourself. This info helps match you with surveys that fit your profile. You can click here for the American Consumer Opinion sign-up. Recommended reading: Learn How To Make Extra Money With American Consumer Opinion 11. Ipsos iSay Ipsos iSay is a survey site that lets you earn rewards for sharing your opinions. It’s run by Ipsos, a big market research company. You can join for free and start taking surveys right away. When you finish a survey, you get points and you can trade them for gift cards or cash through PayPal once you have enough. Most surveys on Ipsos iSay take about 10 to 20 minutes to finish. They cover all sorts of topics, from products to current events. You might even get to test new items sometimes. The site has a loyalty program too. The more surveys you do, the more extra points you can earn. This helps your rewards grow faster. One nice thing about Ipsos iSay is that it’s available in many countries. So you can probably use it no matter where you live. They also have an app, making it easy to take surveys on your phone. Please click here to sign up for Ipsos iSay and get 250 free points for joining. Recommended reading: Ipsos iSay Review: Is It Legit or a Scam? Here’s a screenshot from my Rakuten account showing how much cash back I have recently earned. (I edited out some personal info, such as the order numbers). 12. Rakuten Rakuten is a great way to earn cash back on your online shopping. It’s kind of similar to Swagbucks but is all about earning cash back on your online shopping. You can get cash back at over 3,500 stores when you shop through Rakuten. This includes big names like Amazon, Walmart, and Target. To use Rakuten, just click through their site or app before you shop online. They’ll track your purchase and add cash back to your account. Rakuten pays out every three months by check or PayPal. You need at least $5 in your account to get paid. Rakuten also has a browser extension (I highly recommend downloading this so that you don’t forget to get cash back!). It reminds you to activate cash back when you’re on a partner site. While it doesn’t offer as many earning options as Swagbucks, Rakuten is great if you shop online a lot. It’s an easy way to save money on things you’re already buying. I recently made a big purchase online and I was able to get around $90 back from Rakuten. It was very easy and free money! Please click here to sign up for Rakuten. Plus, you can get a $30 bonus when you spend $30 if you join right now (at the time of this writing; please double-check the current offer). Frequently Asked Questions Many people want to know more about Swagbucks and similar sites. Here are answers to common questions about making money with these platforms. What are the best sites like Swagbucks to make money? Some top sites like Swagbucks are Freecash, KashKick, and InboxDollars. These sites let you earn money by taking surveys, watching videos, and shopping online. Fetch Rewards and Survey Junkie are also good options. They offer rewards for everyday activities like scanning receipts or sharing your opinions in online surveys. Can you make $50 a day with Swagbucks? Making $50 a day on Swagbucks is tough. It would take a lot of time and effort. Most people earn a few dollars a day at most. To increase your earnings, you can try doing high-paying surveys and offers and using the site when you shop online to get cash back too. Is it possible to make $100 a day from Swagbucks? Earning $100 daily on Swagbucks is not realistic for most people. The site isn’t meant to replace a full-time job. A more reasonable goal is $5 to $10 per day if you put in several hours of work. How to get 10,000 Swagbucks fast? Getting 10,000 SB quickly takes some work. Try these tips: Complete the highest-paying surveys Sign up for free trials through Swagbucks Use Swagbucks when you shop online Watch videos in your spare time Invite friends to join (you’ll get bonuses) Is Survey Junkie better than Swagbucks? Survey Junkie and Swagbucks both have pros and cons. Survey Junkie focuses mainly on surveys (they have many more survey opportunities), while Swagbucks has more ways to earn. Survey Junkie might be better if you only want to do surveys. Swagbucks is great if you like variety in earning options (such as by playing games, scanning receipts from retailers, and searching the web). What are the best apps like Swagbucks for games? I think the best app like Swagbucks for games is Freecash. I have personally made $302 in one week by playing games on my phone through Freecash. Sites Like Swagbucks To Make Extra Money – Summary I hope you enjoyed this article on the best sites like Swagbucks to make side cash. If you’re looking for easy ways to make extra money online, there are many Swagbucks alternatives. You can earn money by doing surveys, playing games, searching online, watching videos, and trying out new apps. These companies allow you to earn PayPal cash, bank transfers, checks, Bitcoin, and free gift cards to places like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, Apple, Home Depot, and more. These sites won’t make you rich, but with some time, you can make a little extra money each month. I have personally earned over 100 free gift cards as well as PayPal cash by using many of the sites listed in this article. They are all real. Here’s a quick summary of my top websites like Swagbucks: Freecash KashKick InboxDollars Fetch Rewards Survey Junkie Pinecone Research PrizeRebel MyPoints Branded Surveys American Consumer Opinion Ipsos iSay Rakuten Plus, you can join Swagbucks for free here too. What are your favorite sites like Swagbucks? html:
Looking for ways to make extra cash online? Websites like Swagbucks can give you many chances to make money from home. You can answer surveys, watch videos, play game apps to win real money, and more to earn extra money. If you’re looking to make more money, trying out different reward sites can be an…

Looking for ways to make extra cash online? Websites like Swagbucks can give you many chances to make money from home. You can answer surveys, watch videos, play game apps to win real money, and more to earn extra money.

If you’re looking to make more money, trying out different reward sites can be an easy move. Each one has its own set of tasks and ways to earn. Some might pay better for certain activities, while others could have easier goals to reach.

I have earned over 100 free gift cards and PayPal money by using many of the sites below, so I know they are real!

What Is Swagbucks?

Swagbucks is a free website that pays you to do easy online tasks. You can earn points called SB for things like:

  • Taking surveys
  • Watching videos
  • Playing games
  • Shopping online
  • Searching the web
  • Scanning receipts

It’s simple to use and you can do it anywhere with internet access.

When you earn enough SB points, you can trade them for gift cards or PayPal cash.

Swagbucks started in 2008 (you can find my full Swagbucks review here). Since then, they’ve given out over $606 million to members. Every day, about 7,000 people get free gift cards.

You won’t get rich using Swagbucks. But it’s an easy way to earn some extra spending money or save up for small treats. Many people use it during free time, like when watching TV.

I have been using this site since around 2011 and I have earned over 100 free gift cards. I like to use my points for free Amazon gift cards!

If you join Swagbucks through my referral link, you will receive a $10 bonus.

Best Websites Like Swagbucks

Here’s a quick list of the best sites like Swagbucks:

  • Freecash
  • KashKick
  • InboxDollars
  • Fetch Rewards
  • Survey Junkie
  • Pinecone Research
  • PrizeRebel
  • MyPoints
  • Branded Surveys
  • American Consumer Opinion
  • Ipsos iSay
  • Rakuten

Below are the best websites like Swagbucks to make money.

1. Freecash

Freecash is a website that lets you earn money by doing fun activities online. You can make extra cash by playing games, trying new apps, and answering surveys. It’s really easy to use and you can start earning right away.

When you sign up for Freecash, you’ll see lots of different ways to make money. You can pick the ones that sound most interesting to you. For example, you might get paid to play a new game on your phone or share your thoughts in a survey.

Some people are able to earn a decent amount on Freecash as well. They have a leaderboard where you can see exactly how much others have earned. According to this leaderboard, one person had made $5,698.71 in the last 25 days! Many others have made over $1,000 in the same time frame as well.

I have personally made a little over $300 by playing games on my phone on Freecash in only one week. You can read about it here – How I Made $302.80 Playing Games on My Phone (In One Week).

Click here to sign up for Freecash.

Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit?

2. KashKick

KashKick is a rewards site where you can earn money by doing fun activities online. You can take surveys, play games, and try out new apps to make extra cash.

One fun thing about KashKick is that you can play popular games like Monopoly GO, Yahtzee, and Bingo Blitz. You can earn up to $100 or more for reaching certain levels in these games.

KashKick pays you through PayPal once you reach $10 in earnings.

Please click here to sign up for KashKick for free.

Recommended reading: KashKick Review

3. InboxDollars

InboxDollars is a great option if you like Swagbucks as they are very similar. It’s easy to use and has many ways to earn money online.

You can take surveys, watch videos, play games, and shop to earn cash. InboxDollars also lets you earn by reading emails and searching the web. Most surveys on InboxDollars pay between $0.50 and $5.

When you sign up, you get a $5 bonus and this site pays in real cash instead of points, which is nice.

The site works on computers and phones. This means you can earn money anywhere, anytime.

InboxDollars is owned by the same company as Swagbucks, so it’s trustworthy and reliable.

Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus.

4. Fetch Rewards

Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you points for scanning your receipts. You can use it at any store or restaurant. I scan every single one of my grocery receipts and earn free points, for example.

Here’s how it works: You shop like normal, then take a picture of your receipt with your phone. The app gives you points for each receipt you scan.

You can earn more points by buying certain items and the app shows you which products will get you extra points.

Once you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards. You can get cards for places like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks.

Fetch Rewards is easy to use. You don’t need to clip coupons or do surveys. Just scan your receipts and watch your points grow.

I love this app because it’s really easy to use. I’ve been using it for a while, and it makes earning rewards from your regular shopping simple. I just used my points to get a $50 Amazon gift card the other day!

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards here. 

Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review (Is This App Legit?)

5. Survey Junkie

Survey Junkie is a popular site that pays you for sharing your opinions. It focuses on surveys, so it doesn’t have games or other ways to earn points – but it has a lot of available surveys for you to answer.

You can sign up for free and start earning points right away. The surveys are about different topics, and you pick the ones you want to do.

Each survey tells you how long it will take and how many points you’ll get, so this helps you choose the best ones for your time.

When you have enough points, you can trade them for money. You can get paid through PayPal or with gift cards.

You can sign up for Survey Junkie here.

6. Pinecone Research

Pinecone Research is a popular survey site that lets you make money sharing your opinions. It’s similar to Swagbucks but focuses mainly on surveys.

You can earn points for each survey you complete and these points can be traded for cash or prizes.

Pinecone Research is known for paying well, as well as giving free items occasionally to test. Most surveys pay around $3 each.

To join, you need an invite so this makes it more exclusive than some other survey sites.

Like Swagbucks, Pinecone Research is free to join. You don’t need to pay anything to start earning money from surveys.

I have been using Pinecone Research for years and personally earned money from this company. In the past, I have been able to test a few different household products through Pinecone Research, such as toilet paper. It is very popular!

You can sign up for Pinecone Research here.

Recommended reading: Pinecone Research Review: What You Should Know

7. PrizeRebel

PrizeRebel is another site where you can earn money online. It’s like Swagbucks in many ways. You can make extra cash by taking surveys and doing small tasks.

The site is easy to use. You can start earning points right away and your points can be turned into cash or gift cards.

PrizeRebel has surveys as its main way to earn. You can also watch videos and complete offers.

You can cash out your earnings once you reach $5. This is a low threshold, so you can get your rewards quickly. PrizeRebel pays through PayPal or gift cards.

You can sign up for PrizeRebel here.

8. MyPoints

MyPoints is a lot like Swagbucks. You can earn points for doing fun online activities such as taking surveys, watching videos, and playing games.

One cool thing about MyPoints is that you get points for shopping online. Just click through their links to your favorite stores and earn points on your purchases.

You can also earn by reading emails and printing coupons. It’s easy to rack up points quickly with all these options.

When you have enough points, you can trade them for gift cards (popular gift card choices include Amazon, Walmart, and Starbucks) or PayPal cash.

You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here.

9. Branded Surveys

Branded Surveys is a popular website where you can make money by sharing your opinions. It’s free to join and available to people in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom.

You can earn points by taking surveys on different topics. These surveys usually pay between $0.50 and $5 each, depending on how long they take. Most surveys take about 5 to 20 minutes to finish.

When you sign up, you’ll get 100 free points as a welcome bonus. You can also earn points by inviting friends, answering daily polls, and winning leaderboard contests.

Once you have 500 points (worth $5), you can cash out. You can choose to get paid through PayPal or pick from over 100 different gift card options.

Branded Surveys is great for making some extra cash in your spare time. You won’t get rich, but it’s an easy way to earn money while watching TV or relaxing at home. All you need is an internet connection and a device like a phone or computer.

You can sign up for Branded Surveys here.

Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn

10. American Consumer Opinion

American Consumer Opinion is a survey site where you can make money sharing your thoughts. It’s been around for a while and has a good reputation.

You can take surveys about different topics like products, ads, and current events. Most surveys pay between $0.50 and $2.50, but some longer ones can pay up to $50.

Signing up is free and easy because you just need to give some basic info about yourself. This info helps match you with surveys that fit your profile.

You can click here for the American Consumer Opinion sign-up.

Recommended reading: Learn How To Make Extra Money With American Consumer Opinion

11. Ipsos iSay

Ipsos iSay is a survey site that lets you earn rewards for sharing your opinions. It’s run by Ipsos, a big market research company. You can join for free and start taking surveys right away.

When you finish a survey, you get points and you can trade them for gift cards or cash through PayPal once you have enough.

Most surveys on Ipsos iSay take about 10 to 20 minutes to finish. They cover all sorts of topics, from products to current events. You might even get to test new items sometimes.

The site has a loyalty program too. The more surveys you do, the more extra points you can earn. This helps your rewards grow faster.

One nice thing about Ipsos iSay is that it’s available in many countries. So you can probably use it no matter where you live. They also have an app, making it easy to take surveys on your phone.

Please click here to sign up for Ipsos iSay and get 250 free points for joining.

Recommended reading: Ipsos iSay Review: Is It Legit or a Scam?

12. Rakuten

Rakuten is a great way to earn cash back on your online shopping. It’s kind of similar to Swagbucks but is all about earning cash back on your online shopping.

You can get cash back at over 3,500 stores when you shop through Rakuten. This includes big names like Amazon, Walmart, and Target.

To use Rakuten, just click through their site or app before you shop online. They’ll track your purchase and add cash back to your account.

Rakuten pays out every three months by check or PayPal. You need at least $5 in your account to get paid.

Rakuten also has a browser extension (I highly recommend downloading this so that you don’t forget to get cash back!). It reminds you to activate cash back when you’re on a partner site.

While it doesn’t offer as many earning options as Swagbucks, Rakuten is great if you shop online a lot. It’s an easy way to save money on things you’re already buying.

I recently made a big purchase online and I was able to get around $90 back from Rakuten. It was very easy and free money!

Please click here to sign up for Rakuten. Plus, you can get a $30 bonus when you spend $30 if you join right now (at the time of this writing; please double-check the current offer).

Frequently Asked Questions

Many people want to know more about Swagbucks and similar sites. Here are answers to common questions about making money with these platforms.

What are the best sites like Swagbucks to make money?

Some top sites like Swagbucks are Freecash, KashKick, and InboxDollars. These sites let you earn money by taking surveys, watching videos, and shopping online. Fetch Rewards and Survey Junkie are also good options. They offer rewards for everyday activities like scanning receipts or sharing your opinions in online surveys.

Can you make $50 a day with Swagbucks?

Making $50 a day on Swagbucks is tough. It would take a lot of time and effort. Most people earn a few dollars a day at most. To increase your earnings, you can try doing high-paying surveys and offers and using the site when you shop online to get cash back too.

Is it possible to make $100 a day from Swagbucks?

Earning $100 daily on Swagbucks is not realistic for most people. The site isn’t meant to replace a full-time job. A more reasonable goal is $5 to $10 per day if you put in several hours of work.

How to get 10,000 Swagbucks fast?

Getting 10,000 SB quickly takes some work. Try these tips:

  • Complete the highest-paying surveys
  • Sign up for free trials through Swagbucks
  • Use Swagbucks when you shop online
  • Watch videos in your spare time
  • Invite friends to join (you’ll get bonuses)

Is Survey Junkie better than Swagbucks?

Survey Junkie and Swagbucks both have pros and cons. Survey Junkie focuses mainly on surveys (they have many more survey opportunities), while Swagbucks has more ways to earn. Survey Junkie might be better if you only want to do surveys. Swagbucks is great if you like variety in earning options (such as by playing games, scanning receipts from retailers, and searching the web).

What are the best apps like Swagbucks for games?

I think the best app like Swagbucks for games is Freecash. I have personally made $302 in one week by playing games on my phone through Freecash.

Sites Like Swagbucks To Make Extra Money – Summary

I hope you enjoyed this article on the best sites like Swagbucks to make side cash.

If you’re looking for easy ways to make extra money online, there are many Swagbucks alternatives. You can earn money by doing surveys, playing games, searching online, watching videos, and trying out new apps.

These companies allow you to earn PayPal cash, bank transfers, checks, Bitcoin, and free gift cards to places like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, Apple, Home Depot, and more.

These sites won’t make you rich, but with some time, you can make a little extra money each month.

I have personally earned over 100 free gift cards as well as PayPal cash by using many of the sites listed in this article. They are all real.

Here’s a quick summary of my top websites like Swagbucks:

  • Freecash
  • KashKick
  • InboxDollars
  • Fetch Rewards
  • Survey Junkie
  • Pinecone Research
  • PrizeRebel
  • MyPoints
  • Branded Surveys
  • American Consumer Opinion
  • Ipsos iSay
  • Rakuten

Plus, you can join Swagbucks for free here too.

What are your favorite sites like Swagbucks?
